items.title: Web Developer & Integrator Diploma
items.subtitle: OpenClassrooms
items.text: Acquired skills through 12 professionally validated web development projects. Training focused on CSS/SCSS, HTML, JavaScript, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and React/Redux.

items.title: Electric Equipment Operation Training
items.subtitle: Auchan
items.text: Training in operating pallet jacks and electric stackers as part of my maintenance and handling responsibilities at Auchan.

items.title: Head of Design
items.subtitle: CreatLinx, London
items.text: Co-founder of a blockchain/cryptocurrency startup. Involved in recruitment, design validation, development, and organizational planning. Balanced diverse roles from team building to strategic direction within a dynamic startup environment.

items.title: Freelance Web Developer - React/Next
items.subtitle: Independent
items.text: Developed a comprehensive personal portfolio to launch freelance web development services. Focusing on creating a robust showcase of technical skills and design capabilities to attract potential clients.

items.title: Versatile Employee
items.subtitle: Auchan, Illkirch
items.text: Worked as a multi-skilled employee in a supermarket within the maintenance team. Responsibilities included restocking and maintaining shelves, customer service, inventory management, and training on specialized machinery.

items.title: Music
items.text: Guitar, Piano, Drum Pad, and Digital Audio Workstation (advanced skills in FL Studio and extensive experience with various audio plugins).

items.title: ERWAN ROBIN
items.subtitle: FRONT-END WEB DEVELOPER & INTEGRATOR
items.text: A dynamic and diploma-holding Web Front-End Developer, my solid mastery of key programming languages and passion for user experience position me as a professional ready to tackle stimulating challenges. Seeking opportunities within an innovative team to implement my skills through a creative and user-centered approach.
